评论概述: A very nice sweater at a very nice price
评论详情: I was looking for a middle weight sweater that I could wear casually and sometimes as "Business casual" that fit well so could be warn under a jacket. Given the low price I did not have very high expectations. But in fact it turned out to be just fine. The material is lovely, and the fit is snug without being tight. The color is very nice and it is comfortable to wear either as an outer garment or under a jacket or coat. it dies not stretch out during wearing multiple days in a row and holds its shape well. the sweater looks much better than the price would suggest. I am well pleased with this very nice and very economical sweater.
Excellent sweater. The material is good and it fits perfectly. But the color is off.
This is a very nice sweater, although it runs large. Had to return for a size medium for my husband. The green color is very nice!

For hubby - he bought a L. Fit is true to size.  I wash all new clothes before wearing.  I typically hand wash knits.  I think you could wash this in cold on delicate in a machine. I laid flat to dry.  Follow the care suggestions & sweater will look as good as new.  Sweater is vacuumed packed so there are a few wrinkles when you get it unpackaged.  Nothing unexpected.  Great for shipping purposes.  He bought 2 of these sweaters - red & green.  Brilliant colors, no running of color when washed.  Nice feel to the knit.

It was decent. Material is soft. It will work for spring/fall weather. It really wont work for cold weather as its quite thin. The fit say slim but it runs large. I usually wear Medium. Because this said slim fit so I got Large as i would want to wear it over another tshirt/shirt. It was loose. Also sleeves slightly longer then I would want. Doesnt look too bad but not perfect fit. Not wearing it much outside but at home due to fit.
Came in a vacuum sealed package like a food product and when opening up bag, the sweater was completed wrinkled. Not loving the look or quality.

I have ordered numerous products from COOFANDY and I have yet to be disappointed. Their quality and craftsmanship is second to non on the internet. I've worn this sweater to play golf and have worn with a sports jacket. Very versatile and didn't shrink when washed. Excellent quality for a great price. Coofandy products are simply the best.
I bought this for my son who wears a uniform for school. It looks sharp and works perfectly in our uniform guidelines. Great soft basic black sweater. Nice and lightweight.
Fit well and true to size

I ordered this COOFANDY Men V Neck Long Sleeve Slim Fit Pullover Sweater to wear in cooler weather.I've ordered quite a few items from the Coofandy brand, and I've always been happy.  This sweater is no exception.  I ordered it in my usual size, medium, and it fits just as it should.  It holds it shape well.  The fabric is comfortable against my skin and the color is even and matches the item description perfectly.  I'm 5'10", 150 lbs and the sweater is neither too tight not too loose.  The sleeves are the correct length for a medium.  Construction seems solid, with no split seams or loose threads.

This is a nice-looking sweater for work.  I didn't think it was thick enough and the fabric could be softer. Many people wear these over collared shirts like in the ad, so I think then it's just right.  It does have that kind of material that stretches out and loses its shape if you're not careful. So you can't hang this in your closet and you can't roll up your sleeves too much or it will look strange and not fit right.

As a participant in the Amazon Vine program, I had the opportunity to try out the COOFANDY Men's V Neck Dress Sweater. Here's my experience:  Pros:  Soft and Stretchy Material: The soft knit fabric feels good against the skin. It offers just the right amount of stretch, ensuring a snug, yet comfortable fit.  Versatile Style: The solid color, V-neck design, ribbed collar, cuffs, and hemline make this sweater a staple for any wardrobe. The black color, in particular, is sleek and can be paired with almost any outfit.  Applicable to Many Occasions: Whether it's for casual daily wear or a more formal setting like the office, this sweater fits right in. I've also found it to be a great layering piece, pairing well with jackets, blazers, and even a peacoat.  Easy Maintenance: The care instructions are clear. Both hand washing and machine washing are options. The sweater held up well after washing, with no noticeable shrinkage or pilling.  Cons:  Fit: While the sweater does fit well, the "Small" size might be a tad snug for some. It's essential to consult the size chart and consider personal comfort preferences when choosing a size. Conclusion:  The COOFANDY Men V Neck Dress Sweater combines style and comfort, making it a worthy addition to any wardrobe. Its versatile design ensures that it can be worn for various occasions, and the quality of the material promises durability. I recommend this sweater for anyone seeking a stylish and comfortable pullover.  Note: I received this product in the "Small" size and black color

This sweater is a lovely color. The material is soft and stretchy. And it's just too large. The medium is most definitely a large, but if you're a bulkier guy or someone who likes looser-fitting sweaters, this could be for you.  It's definitely high quality, but the sizing is off.

The fabric has a soft feel without being scratchy.  The stitching and overall quality is sturdy and well-made.  I like that it is not a heavy and thick.  It is great for cool Fall weather.  I got dark gray and it is so versatile to dress up or dress down.  You can wear it over most any type of shirt or with a blazer.  It is machine washable, which is great, and it did not shrink at all when I washed the first couple of times.

评论概述: A bit frumpy, but well made
评论详情: I wanted to love this, but it's a bit more shapeless and frumpy in person than it appears in the product photo.  Ordered for our tall teenager, but he's not impressed by how it looks and I don't really blame him.  It's warm, sturdy, and will likely never be worn.  Too baggy and shapeless to be called "slim fit".

I needed some basics for the colder months and this worked out great. It's easy to layer and looks great under a blazer or jacket. The material is nice and stretchy and isn't scratchy so this can be worn alone. I am 5'9",  178lbs and ordered a small. The small fit well. Definitely recommend.
Love the way this looks on my husband, the material is great. I love the color, and it fits him very well.

Most men are looking for a comfortable stylish sweater to wear in either casual or semi-dressed settings.  This COOFANDY Men V Neck Dress Sweater fits the bill to a T.It is very comfortable to wear and the fabric is soft to the touch and a bit stretchy so it will fit almost every body type.  I chose the Wine Red color and sized up 1 size as I wanted it to be a looser fit as I usually wear a shirt underneath.  The entire sweater is made of a ribbed material and gives you a classy look.  The neck is a typical V neck style which allows you to wear another shirt underneath it comfortably.  The sleeves have an elastic band at the bottom keeping them snug against your wrists but not too tight.  The bottom of the sweater also has a band which gently hugs your waist but allows you to move comfortably without the sweater binding.I am very pleased with the quality and design of the sweater.  It has already become one of my current favorites.
It's a good quality sweater. The stitching is done nicely. The material is soft and very comfortable on the skin and it fits really good.
Nice weight and body to this 100% polyester v-neck pullover sweater. Great design, gathered cuffs and waist, springy material that feels like it will hold its shape. The green is really eye-catching.
Looks and fits nice

I bought the XL size and it fits like an XL so the sizing seems to be on point. It is a simple sweater but goes well with slacks. The material has a little stretch to it and is nice and soft to the touch, it’s not thick and heavy but not too thin either. If I had one small gripe, it would be that the V in the neck is quite deep but I, not going to take a star off for that. Overall it is a nice quality sweater.

评论概述: Nice... not preppy... but classy and casual...
评论详情: We ordered this sweater not sure that it would fit in a stylish way or just be "another" sweater that seems preppy/out of date.  Well, this one comes through... the sweater is more comfortable and softer than I thought it would be.  It appears classy-casual looking without seeming stuffy or too, too much.  The material is not as soft as I thought it would be, but it doesn't disappoint the experience of wearing it.  It feels nice!  You feel a little dressy yet laid back.  It goes well with just about everything.  Versatile and fitted.  I think it will do fine in the Wash... probably shouldn't wash too frequently if can help it and it should hold up well.  Class it up on a casual night out or wear it in a comfortable easy-going setting with jeans, etc.  I wear a Medium, went with a Medium, and am happy with this Medium!Thumbs up and a good recommendation for this one… a good review and rating in my book.Fair and appropriate price point... Value with mid-line-quality. Nice overall choice for your sweater collection.  I'll continue to monitor the sweater's quality and longevity and if our rating changes after continuous use and washing we will update the review with additional information, pictures and a re-rating.  Recommended!

As usual I am happy with a Coofandy item once again.  The fit is perfect ( I am a large ) as it does not bunch up and the fabric is very comfortable with a thicker comfortable weave.  I love the wine red color. My wife has become a big fan of the look and quality of the Coofandy products I have ordered, as have I.. Great value  for a great look.

This sweater will definitely be the warmest of all of my V-Neck sweaters as this is definitely a heavier feeling piece. It isn't so heavy that it's uncomfortable by any stretch, but heavier than my mostly lighter weight V-Neck sweaters. Woven very nice. I can definitely tell a very good effort was made to make a very nice sweater!

I am a frequent shopper of Coofandy. I absolutely love their clothing styles and this is v neck sweater is no exception. Perfectly stitched with beautiful material and fits like a glove. In-fact I ordered my normal size xxl this time, when I usually size up when the description says slim fit. Because of the material being stretchy, it fits nicely over a shirt. If you want a fitted look, go for your regular size on this one and you will love it.
Ordering clothes online is always hit or miss. This sweater fits perfectly . The material is soft and very warm, great for fall and winter time.
